original_title: Popular Mechanics for kids: Firefighters and Other Life Saving Heroes
overview: The hosts of this popular children's series hit the streets with several teams of daring rescue workers to see what their fast-paced life and livelihood are all about. Elisha Cuthbert joins firefighters as they put out a blaze, while Jay Baruchel suits up for a firefighting training session. Tyler Kyte heads out to the ocean to see if a lifeguard's job is truly a day at the beach, then meets a team of rescue dogs with some well-trained noses.
title: Popular Mechanics for kids: Firefighters and Other Life Saving Heroes
